locations.name: Modern Glass Office Building Exterior
locations.description: Contemporary corporate office building exterior with floor-to-ceiling glass curtain walls reflecting golden hour sunlight. Sleek steel frames, polished glass panels with subtle reflections, modern architectural design. Visible lobby entrance with glass doors, marble flooring glimpsed through transparency, professional urban setting. Warm amber light washing across glass surfaces creating geometric patterns and bright glare.
locations.image_generation_prompt: Hyper-realistic photorealistic ultra-realistic professional architectural photography of modern glass office building exterior at golden hour. Floor-to-ceiling glass curtain walls with sleek steel frames, polished reflective glass panels, contemporary corporate design. Warm amber sunset light creating intense glare on glass surfaces, geometric reflections, natural lighting. Glass entrance doors, glimpse of marble lobby interior. Documentary photography style, lifelike realistic details, authentic urban architecture, natural light photography, professional real estate photography style, ultra-high definition, realistic glass reflections and textures

versions.description: Bustling urban street at golden hour with intense, uncomfortable glare. Bright washed-out sunlight creating harsh shadows and overexposed highlights. City environment appears slightly hazy and squint-inducing—buildings with blown-out bright spots, indistinct details in harsh light. Modern urban architecture with glass storefronts, pedestrians in silhouette against bright sky, street elements slightly obscured by intense direct sunlight. Everything has a challenging brightness that forces squinting.
versions.image_generation_prompt: Hyper-realistic photorealistic ultra-realistic documentary photography of urban city street at golden hour with harsh intense glare. Bright washed-out sunlight creating uncomfortable overexposed highlights, harsh shadows, blown-out bright areas. Modern city buildings with glass storefronts, pedestrians visible, street environment with challenging brightness. Hazy glare effect, squint-inducing light, realistic lens flare, authentic urban setting. Lifelike natural skin texture on people, real architectural details, professional street photography style, ultra-high definition, realistic lighting conditions, natural photographic grain

versions.version_name: Crystalline Sharp Focus with Polarized View
versions.description: Same urban street transformed into deep, crystalline clarity with polarized vision. Rich saturated colors—deep blues in sky, vibrant reds and oranges in storefronts, vivid greens in urban plantings. Every architectural detail razor-sharp and defined: crisp building edges, clear window reflections, detailed brick textures, sharp signage. Balanced exposure with no glare—shadows retain detail, highlights controlled. City reveals hidden beauty: neon mural colors pop with intensity, jazz musicians' instruments gleam with detail, couples' expressions clearly visible. Everything appears more alive, dimensional, and visually rich.
versions.image_generation_prompt: Hyper-realistic photorealistic ultra-realistic professional photography of urban city street with perfect polarized clarity. Rich deeply saturated colors—vibrant blues, intense reds, vivid greens—balanced exposure with no glare. Razor-sharp architectural details, crisp building edges, clear window reflections, detailed textures. Neon murals with intense colors, visible jazz musicians with gleaming instruments, clear human expressions. Perfect balanced lighting, no overexposure, shadows with retained detail. Lifelike natural skin textures, authentic urban environment, documentary photography style, ultra-high definition, professional color grading, realistic depth and dimension, natural photographic quality

versions.description: Professional in their early 30s with medium build, warm medium-brown skin tone with olive undertones, representing ambiguous ethnic background that could be Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, or Latin American. Thick dark brown hair styled in modern professional cut with natural texture, clean-shaven with defined jawline. Wearing tailored charcoal gray blazer over crisp white dress shirt, top button undone for casual-professional look. Squinting noticeably against harsh sunlight, eyes partially closed, hand reaching toward face in discomfort. Facial expression shows hesitation and uncertainty, slight tension in shoulders. Carrying high-quality tan leather messenger bag. Natural skin texture with slight sheen from warm weather, realistic pores and subtle facial lines.

Same warm medium-brown skin tone, thick dark brown hair, charcoal blazer and white shirt. Shoulders back, chin slightly raised, smooth relaxed facial expression. Eyes subtly visible through lenses with enhanced luminous quality (slightly brighter, more present). Confident subtle smile, ease in movement. characters.name: The Confident Stranger
characters.description: Striking individual in their late 20s with athletic lean build, deep rich brown skin tone with warm undertones, clearly Black with African features—defined cheekbones, full lips, strong jawline. Natural hair in short textured fade cut showing tight coils. Wearing bold oversized square black acetate statement sunglasses with thick frames, creating dramatic fashionable look. Dressed in elevated streetwear: fitted black turtleneck, tailored camel wool overcoat with perfect drape, dark fitted trousers. Walking with purposeful stride, shoulders back, commanding confident energy. Sunglasses dominate the look—bold, unapologetic style. Facial structure shows strength and poise, natural skin texture with subtle sheen. Embodiment of effortless confidence and personal style.
characters.image_generation_prompt: Hyper-realistic photorealistic ultra-realistic professional portrait photography of confident 28-year-old Black person with deep rich brown skin tone with warm undertones, clear African features—defined high cheekbones, full lips, strong jawline, broad nose. Natural short textured fade haircut showing tight coils and kinks. Athletic lean build. Wearing bold oversized square black acetate statement sunglasses with thick dramatic frames. Fitted black turtleneck, tailored camel wool overcoat with perfect drape, dark fitted trousers. Walking with purposeful confident stride, shoulders back, commanding presence and energy. Natural skin texture with realistic pores, subtle healthy sheen, lifelike skin details. Golden hour urban lighting. Documentary photography style, authentic Black features and skin tones, professional fashion portrait photography, ultra-high definition, real person appearance, natural lighting, photorealistic details, street style photography
